LanguageData.USAC_DisposableBattery.label: disposable battery
LanguageData.USAC_DisposableBattery.description: A circular disposable battery capable of quickly charging mechanoids. To prevent safety hazards from unauthorized modification for reuse, the battery is designed to automatically short-circuit and melt after discharge.
LanguageData.USAC_DisposableRepairTool.label: disposable repair tool
LanguageData.USAC_DisposableRepairTool.description: A square nano-storage container capable of releasing nanomachines to automatically analyze and repair damaged structures. To prevent safety hazards from unauthorized modification, the tool is designed for single-use only.
